business.headline: Sensex, Nifty extend losses; IT and metal stocks drag markets downThe S&P BSE Sensex tanked 378.29 points to 75,812.17, while the NSE Nifty50 was down by 92.40 points to 22,999.80 as of 9:45 AM.

Will bears dominate stock market next week? 5 things investors should knowCorporate earnings and key economic data from around the world will likely shape the direction of the stock market, keeping investors on their toes.

70-hour workweek: Are Indians working more or less than the world?70-hour workweek: It started with Infosys founder Naryana Murthy's statement that young Indians should work 70-hour workweeks for India to develop, which was met with a lot of flak.

Budget 2025: 5 top middle-class expectations for tax relief and savings growthExperts suggest scrapping the old tax regime and rationalising the income tax slabs under the new regime, would go a long way in making income tax simpler.

8th Pay Commission may give a 186% boost to pensions. Find out how The fitment factor plays an important role in calculating the updated pay and benefits and is likely to be in the range between 2.28 and 2.86 for the 8th Pay Commission.

Stuck in middle-income trap: Fareed Zakaria decodes China's economic crisisFareed Zakaria said that China's economy is not going to grow any time at the six, seven, eight percent that it was growing at previously.
How to achieve minimum credit score for getting personal loan? Details hereThe higher the credit score, the greater are the chances for the approval of your loan requests.

InterGlobe Aviation Q3 results: IndiGo operator's net profit falls by 18%Indigo Q3 results: The net profit for the aviation company dropped by 18% to Rs 2,449 crore when compared to Rs 2,998 crore in the same quarter a year ago.

Budget 2025: EV sector pushes for tech investments and smart mobility solutionsExperts anticipate that Budget 2025 would introduce policies that would boost EV sales across the country and help India achieve its goal of reducing carbon emissions by one billion tonnes by 2030.

Sensex, Nifty fall amid volatility; energy and pharma lead lossesShare Market: The S&P BSE Sensex shed 329.92 points to close at 76,190.46, while the NSE Nifty50 lost 113.15 points to end at 23,092.20.
Amul cuts milk prices by Re 1 per litre across IndiaThe reduction will only be applicable to 1-litre packs. Previously, in June 2024, Amul had increased milk prices by Rs 2 per litre.

India-US relationship beyond personalities: Fareed Zakaria on Trump 2.0Fareed Zakaria shared his insights on the political shift in the United States and the seismic changes it is expected to bring geopolitically and economically across the world.

Adani Green Energy shares fall as Sri Lanka cancels power purchase dealAdani Green Energy shares fell after the news of Sri Lanka cancelling the power purchase deal to hit the day's low of Rs 1,008, crashing over 6% from the day's high.

Tata Electronics buys 60% controlling stake in Pegatron IndiaTEPL, which is a wholly-owned subsidiary of Tata Sons, said the latest acquisition aligns with Tata Sons' Chairman N Chandrasekaran's vision of investments by the Tata Group in electronics manufacturing.

Why are markets volatile, and should you be worried? 3 things to know Sensex scaled to 76,985.95, reaching the day's high, a jump of over 500 points, but was trading at 76,621.03 as of 1 PM. Nifty has also gone about in the same manner.

Paytm denies ED probe in crypto scam, calls reports 'factually incorrect'Paytm Latest News: Paytm's clarification came after a few media reports claimed that the ED is investigating the fintech firm and other payment gateways in a cryptocurrency scam.

Explained: Why Paytm share price tumbled nearly 9% todayPaytm share price: The shares of the company fell nearly 9% to hit a day's low of Rs 773.90. At 12:18 pm, shares of the fintech company stabilised a bit to trade 2.27% higher at Rs 829.70.
Why did Cyient CEO Karthikeyan Natarajan resign?The resignation of Cyient's CEO Karthikeyan Natarajan was a major reason that led to the sharp decline in the company's share price.

HUL to acquire stake in Minimalist for Rs 2,670 crore; Peak XV bags 10X gainsHUL has acquired a 90.5% stake in Minimalist for Rs 2,670 crore, making it one of the biggest acquisitions in the country's startup ecosystem.

Cyient share price falls 20% to hit 52-week low. What triggered Friday's crash?Cyient stock price: At around 10:21 am, shares of Cyient were down 17.96% to Rs 1,438 on the Bombay Stock Exchange (BSE). In early trade, shares of the IT company fell as much as 20% to hit a 52-week low of Rs 1,402.25.

entertainment.headline: Bigg Boss Kannada 11: Hanumantha Lamani wins trophy, Sudeep bids adieu to showHanumantha Lamani, who was a wild card entrant on the show, won Bigg Boss Kannada Season 11. Host Kichcha Sudeep bid adieu to the reality show after 11 years.

Coldplay signs off after whirlwind India tour: We'll never forget these two weeksColdplay held its biggest-ever concert in Ahmedabad, India, on January 26. Sharing a photo of the packed stadium, the British rock band said that they will never forget the two weeks they spent in India.

Chris Martin pauses My Universe to ensure fan safety at Ahmedabad showDuring Sunday's concert in Ahmedabad, Coldplay's lead singer Chris Martin paused mid-performance to ensure the safety of a fan. The moment was captured during the show's live-streaming on Disney+ Hotstar.

Chris Martin jokes he is from Telangana, calls Coldplay an Indian bandDuring their recent performance in India, Coldplay's lead singer, Chris Martin, joked about being born here. The British rock band concluded their India tour with a final concert in Ahmedabad on Sunday.

Chris Martin sings Everglow with fan couple at Ahmedabad concertDuring the Ahmedabad concert, Chris Martin performed Coldplay's popular song Everglow with a fan couple. The heartfelt moment was streamed live on Disney+ Hotstar.

India new frontier of live entertainment: Anand Mahindra after a Coldplay 'record'Anand Mahindra shared a stunning aerial video of Coldplay's concert in Ahmedabad, emphasising India's growing stature in global live entertainment.

Most Hindi I've ever learned: Chris Martin's thank you at massive Ahmedabad showColdplay's Chris Martin thrilled fans by speaking in Hindi during the Ahmedabad concert on January 26. He greeted the audience in Hindi and extended Republic Day wishes, leaving fans delighted.

Bigg Boss Kannada 11 grand finale: When and where to watch Kichcha Sudeep showThe highly-anticipated grand finale of Bigg Boss Kannada 11 will be held on Sunday, January 26. It is hosted by Kichcha Sudeep.

He shaved his head when I did: Hina Khan's moving note for boyfriend RockyActor Hina Khan shared a heartfelt note on Instagram, praising her boyfriend Rocky Jaiswal for his unwavering support during her cancer battle.
Watch: Coldplay lead vocalist Chris Martin greets Ahmedabad fans in GujaratiSinger Chris Martin of Coldplay surprised Ahmedabad fans by greeting them in Gujarati during their Ahmedabad concert.

Stranger Things 5 out in November? Eagle-eyed fans spot release dateStranger Things fans may have discovered the release date for the fifth season through a Netflix code. The show will reportedly be released in November 2025.

Storyteller trailer: Paresh Rawal, Adil Hussain shine in Satyajit Ray's short storyThe trailer for The Storyteller starring Paresh Rawal and Adil Hussain has been released. The film brings emotional complexity to Satyajit Ray's classic short story Golpo Boliye Tarini Khuro.

Guru Randhawa visits Maha Kumbh: Blessed to take a sacred dip in Maa GangaSinger Guru Randhawa visited the Maha Kumbh Mela 2025 in Prayagraj and took a sacred dip in the Ganga. He wrote about starting a new journey.

Suits LA trailer: Stephen Amell takes you to 'west coast', Harvey Spector reappearsThe trailer of Suits LA teased actor Gabriel Macht's return as Harvey Spector in the new spin-off series. Actor Stephen Amell leads the show, which is going to be premiered next month.

Coldplay's Chris Martin enjoys scooter ride in Ahmedabad ahead of concertColdplay's Chris Martin made a memorable entrance in Ahmedabad by arriving on a scooter. The iconic rock band is scheduled to perform at the Narendra Modi Stadium on January 25 and 26.

Identity OTT release: When and where to watch Tovino Thomas, Trisha's thrillerIdentity OTT release date: The Tovino Thomas and Trisha Krishnan-starrer is set to release on Zee5. Directed by Akhil Paul and Anas Khan, the psychological thriller will begin streaming from next week.

Coldplay in India: A rollercoaster of excitement, chaos, and disappointmentColdplay's first three concerts in India have left fans with mixed feelings. While tickets for all the five shows sold out quickly, fans all over the country complained about the issues surrounding the Mumbai concerts.

OTT releases of the week: Hisaab Barabar, Sweet Dreams, Sivarapalli and moreWith the weekend around the corner, here's a list of all the latest films and series that will release on OTT this week. Take a look at some here.

Benedict Cumberbatch says it will take 'lot of money' to return as SherlockBritish star Benedict Cumberbatch recently opened up about whether he would return as Sherlock Holmes. The actor played the famed fictional detective in the BBC series.
TV newsmakers of the weekStarting from Karan Veer Merhra's Bigg Boss 18 win to Bal Veer actor's engagement, the television world was full of exciting news and events. Read to know more.

general news.headline: Uttarakhand to implement Uniform Civil Code today, first state to do soUniform Civil Code: Uttarakhand is set to become the first state to implement the Uniform Civil Code (UCC) today, marking a historic move. Chief Minister Pushkar Singh Dhami will unveil the UCC portal, ahead of Prime Minister Modi's state visit.

Colombia agrees to take in deported migrants after Trump threat, no tariffs: USFollowing President Donald Trump's first international tariff dispute with Colombia, the White House announced on Monday that the Latin American country has agreed to accept deported immigrants on US military flights.

Trouble for Vicky Kaushal's 'Chhaava', Minister seeks ban over objectionable sceneWhile acknowledging the effort to bring the legacy of Chhatrapati Sambhaji Maharaj to a wider audience, Samant made it clear that historical accuracy must be maintained.

Lens on H-1B, but rich Indians might be buying US citizenship with EB-5Temporary visas like H-1B and L1, which are used by thousands of Indians, are in Donald Trump and his MAGA's crosshairs. But for rich Indians, permanent residency in the US is a check away. With an investment of about a million dollars, the rich are buying their way to a Green Card.

Ahmedabad pulls off Coldplay's biggest-ever concert, fans say 'mogged Mumbai'Coldplay's Ahmedabad concerts were widely praised for their seamless organisation, enthusiastic crowd, and world-class infrastructure. Fans invariably compared them to the shows in Mumbai earlier this month.

AAP to launch poll manifesto today, key focus on welfare schemes and employmentDelhi elections: The Aam Aadmi Party (AAP) will release its manifesto today for the Delhi Assembly elections, focusing on social welfare, employment, and public services.

Indonesian President's 'Indian DNA' quip at dinner leaves PM Modi in splits At a dinner hosted in his honour by President Droupadi Murmu, Indonesian President Prabowo Subianto joked about his recent discovery of Indian ancestry, revealing that a DNA test had shown his connection to India.

Here's whyAlexander Zverev's Australian Open final loss to Jannik Sinner was marred by yet another controversy, as a fan interrupted his post-match speech. education.headline: The role of data analytics in modern advertising educationThis transformation also exercises a significant impact on the realm of 'advertising education.'

NCERT deletes Azad Pak, adds China's aggression reference in Class 12 textbookThe NCERT has made final changes to its Class 12 Political Science textbook syllabus for the upcoming academic year, including a revision in reference to India's border situation with China, Azad Pakistan, Article 370 and more.

NEET row: Bihar cops find 6 post-dated cheques 'issued for question paper brokers'Six post-dated cheques which were suspected to have been issued in favour of mafia demanding over Rs 30 lakh from each candidate seeking alleged leaked question paper ahead of NEET held last month were recovered by Bihar Police.

Forest fires surge tenfold from 2004 to 2017: Causes, impact and preventionAmidst a relentless surge, intense forest fires are now multiplying tenfold, casting a menacing shadow over our flora and fauna. Year by year, their fiery grip tightens, threatening ecosystems far and wide, now extending their reach to impact human lives.

Fresh plea in Supreme Court to recall NEET results, reconduct examsA fresh petition has been filed in the Supreme Court to recall the National Entrance cum Eligibility Test - Under Graduate (NEET-UG) 2024 results and re-conduct fresh examination after discrepancies in the declared results.

NTA issues clarification after NEET result controversy over toppers, high cut-offIn a detailed statement, the National Testing Agency (NTA) said that the increase in cut-off and number of toppers in the NEET-UG reflect the competitive nature of the exam and maintained that the test's integrity has not been compromised.

Exclusive: Arvind Kejriwal claims 'BJP succession war, PM backing Amit Shah'Speaking exclusively to India Today TV, Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal claimed that there is a "succession war" within the BJP. He also claimed that the ruling party is "not fighting the Lok Sabha elections as a team".
